author: NewsBreak Original
title: Cooper Flagg’s explosive athleticism was on display in Maine this weekend
text: Two years out from winning a gold ball with Nokomis and becoming the first freshman to win Maine Gatorade Player of the Year, Cooper Flagg made his first appearance with Montverde Academy back in his home state, putting on a show for thousands of fans at the Maine Event. Demonstrating the continued physical and instinctual maturity he has undergone at Montverde Academy, Cooper exploded for 26 points (64.7 percent shooting), 9.5 rebounds, 3.5 assists and 5.5 blocks per game against some of the country’s top talent, turning Portland into a frenzied basketball mecca for two straight nights. As the nation’s No. 1 basketball prospect regardless of class, all eyes are on Newport’s very own future Duke Blue Devil to succeed at the college level, and later as an NBA lottery pick. His explosiveness, instincts and versatility have been compared to the skillsets of Paul George , Aaron Gordon and Larry Bird , and this weekend Cooper proved that he’s just scratching the surface of what he could become. “I’ve had the good fortune of coaching a lot of guys picked high in the draft, and he’s every bit as much with the Cade Cunninghams, the Scottie Barnes and the Kyrie Irivings,” 13-year Montverde head coach Kevin Boyle said. “He’s on that path, no question — he could fall short, or go beyond.” Of his many traits, Cooper’s explosiveness was the most electrifying element in Portland this weekend. Whether it was his slam dunk three seconds into Friday’s game , his unbelievable alley-oops on Saturday or his 11 blocks on the weekend, Cooper easily won over the home crowd while striking fear into the opponent’s hearts. Practically able to reach the rim with his head when leaping flat-footed, Cooper made Gonzaga and CATS hesitant to drive to the basket on him — even with a numbers advantage in transition — and when combined with his quickness, he could easily make up for 4 to 5 feet of separation on catch-and-shoot jump shots. While less flashy yet equally as evident, Cooper’s high basketball IQ was on display in both games, passing when double-teamed and remaining communicative on defense. The 17-year-old was able to find the open man down low, and was very unselfish moving the ball around the perimeter — fitting seamlessly into Montverde’s offensive locomotive. Moreover, Cooper almost never turned the ball over, and only committed two fouls each game. Finally, Cooper also contradicted criticisms of his outside shot-taking and skill package, shooting 5-for-8 from beyond the arc and flexing his craftiness near the basket. Against CATS Academy, Cooper made three consecutive 3-pointers in the span of 90 seconds, accelerated into a pull-up bank shot from about 7 feet out, and contorted his way through two defenders for a crafty lay-up in the paint. “At his size growing up, you’re playing the center position all the time, but he’s got a lot more comfortable playing further away from the basket. He’s gotta get his handle a little tighter and shoot it more consistently to be an elite NBA player, and I think that will happen — he’s in the gym all the time and understands what he needs to do to get better,” Boyle said. “You gotta be a little selfish if you want to become a star-level player. But being selfish in his way is good, because it’s good for the team.”

author: Get News
title: Nest and Care Reaffirms Its Dedication to Leading Bethesda Senior Care | User | theeveningleader.com
text:
Nest and Care, a premier Bethesda, MD senior care provider, reaffirms its commitment to high-quality, compassionate home care for the elderly. Offering personalized care plans, their services range from daily living assistance to specialized care, ensuring seniors' health, happiness, and independence. Trust Nest and Care for your loved one's needs. Google it at https://nestandcare.com for more information. Bethesda, MD - Nest and Care, a pivotal provider of senior care services in Bethesda, MD, is proud to announce its ongoing commitment to offering the highest-quality home care for the elderly community. Recognized for its exceptional service and dedication to enhancing the lives of seniors, Nest and Care ensures that families in Bethesda have access to reliable, compassionate care for their loved ones.
"At Nest and Care, we understand the importance of providing a supportive and caring environment for our seniors," said Kat Villanueva, owner of Nest and Care. "Our mission is to deliver personalized care that meets the unique needs of each individual, promoting their health, happiness, and independence. We are devoted to being Bethesda's trusted home care provider, continually adapting and improving our services to meet the evolving needs of our community."
Nest and Care's range of services encompasses everything from basic assistance with daily living activities to more specialized care for those with chronic conditions or recovering from illness or surgery. By focusing on comprehensive and personalized care plans, Nest and Care's professional caregivers are equipped to address seniors' physical, emotional, and social needs, ensuring a higher quality of life and peace of mind for clients and their families.
For more information about Nest and Care and their Bethesda senior care, please visit their website at https://nestandcare.com
About Nest and Care:
Nest and Care is a leading provider of home care services in Bethesda, MD, dedicated to improving the lives of seniors through high-quality, compassionate care. With a team of highly trained and dedicated caregivers, Nest and Care offers a wide range of personalized home care solutions designed to meet the diverse needs of the elderly community. Committed to excellence, Nest and Care continues to set the standard for senior care in Bethesda and beyond.

author: ETV Bharat
title: हमीरपुर से फिलिस्तीन में फंडिंग; NGO के जरिए भेजा गया पैसा, लखनऊ पुलिस ने 7 से की पूछताछ
text:
हमीरपुर: उत्तर प्रदेश के हमीरपुर जिले से फिलिस्तीन समेत कई ऐसे देशों को फंडिग की जा रही है, जहां पर युद्ध चल रहे हैं या हाल ही में हुए हैं. ये फंडिंग एक NGO के जरिए की गई हैं. इसकी जानकारी लगते ही खुफिया एजेंसी अलर्ट हो गई हैं.
बुधवार की रात लखनऊ पुलिस की एक स्पेशल टीम ने हमीरपुर पुलिस के साथ मिलकर मौदहा कस्बे में 7 लोगों से अलग-अलग पूछताछ की. इन 7 लोगों के मोबाइल फोन, बैंक लेनदेन और अन्य दस्तावेजों की लखनऊ की टीम ने गहन जांच की.
खुफिया सूत्रों के अनुसार, सहारनपुर की एक महिला द्वारा मोबाइल स्टेट्स में मौदहा की संस्था का नाम लेकर विदेश में मदद पहुंचाने के लिए आभार जताया गया था. इसके बाद एजेंसियों की नजर इस नेटवर्क पर गई.
सीओ मौदहा विनीता पहल ने बताया कि लखनऊ से आई टीम ने 7 लोगों से पूछताछ की है. एसपी हमीरपुर डॉ. दीक्षा शर्मा ने बताया कि टीम ने सात लोगों से पूछताछ करके उनके मोबाइल, दस्तावेज और बैंकिंग लेनदेन की जांच की है. मामला संवेदनशील है, जांच जारी है.
टीम देर रात पूछताछ के बाद लखनऊ वापस चली गई. लेकिन, किसी को हिरासत में लेकर गई है या नहीं, इस पर अभी कुछ नहीं कहा जा सकता. पुलिस को शक है कि एनजीओ के जरिए युद्धग्रस्त देशों जैसे फिलिस्तीन आदि में आर्थिक मदद भेजी गई, जिसे डिजिटल माध्यमों से ट्रैक किया जा रहा है. मामला आईबी और एटीएस तक जा सकता है.
ये भी पढ़ेंः अबदुल्लाह आजम खान से 4 करोड़ 64 लाख की रिकवरी का आदेश; स्टांप ड्यूटी की चोरी से जुड़ा मामला

author: Vincent Prod'Homme
title: Isère. « Ici, si tu n'as pas la clim', tu meurs » : les habitants du quartier de Servenoble à Villefontaine face à la canicule
text:
Isère « Ici, si tu n’as pas la clim’, tu meurs » : les habitants du quartier de Servenoble à Villefontaine face à la canicule
Sur le panneau lumineux de la pharmacie du quartier de Servenoble, à Villefontaine, le mercure affiche 42 °C en plein après-midi. La petite fontaine située sur la place est désespérément sèche. À gauche, une rangée de quatre immeubles de huit étages semble martyrisée par le soleil. En contrebas, il y a ce qui est considéré comme un refuge par les...

author: Lucas Young
title: Remembering Richard Parsons: A Legacy of Leadership
text:
Remembering Richard Parsons: A Legacy of Leadership
[Lucas Young](https://investorshangout.com/profile/view?id=79346)Updated: 12-26-2024 05:21 PM
Remembering a Visionary Leader
Richard Parsons, a remarkable figure whose influence extended across major corporations, has passed away at the age of 76. He contributed significantly to the success of notable companies including Time Warner, CBS, and Citigroup.
A Distinctive Leadership Journey
Throughout his career, Parsons was known for his extraordinary ability to steer companies through complex challenges. His leadership style was characterized by clarity, decisiveness, and an unwavering commitment to fostering stability even in turbulent times.
Strategic Decision-Making
Richard's role in various organizations often involved making tough decisions during crises. At Time Warner, for instance, he played a pivotal role in restructuring efforts that not only salvaged the company's reputation but also paved the way for future growth.
Building Trust with Stakeholders
One of Parsons' most admirable qualities was his aptitude for building trust with key stakeholders. During his tenure at CBS, he was instrumental in calming anxieties among investors, employees, and the media, ensuring that the company's vision remained intact even amidst challenges.
A Legacy of Resilience
Beyond his corporate achievements, Richard Parsons will be remembered for his resilience and ability to adapt to a constantly changing environment. His enduring impact will resonate, particularly in corporate leadership circles, as a benchmark for effective management.
A Friend to Many
His legacy extends beyond professional achievements; he was a beloved friend and mentor. Ronald S. Lauder, a close friend, reflected on Parsons as a person who inspired those around him, showcasing his remarkable interpersonal skills and genuine care for others.
Health Challenges
Despite his remarkable career, Richard faced significant health challenges, ultimately succumbing to cancer. This illustrates the fragility of life, reminding us to appreciate the time spent with loved ones and to cherish the moments that shape our lives.
Continuing His Legacy
As we remember Richard Parsons, it is essential to consider how we can embody his values of resilience, trust, and effective leadership in our own lives. His contributions to the business world, especially through companies like Citigroup and CBS, set a high standard for future leaders.
Inspiring Future Generations
Those who had the honor of working alongside Parsons will undoubtedly carry his wisdom forward, using the lessons learned from his leadership to inspire others. His story serves as an encouragement for current and aspiring leaders to navigate challenges with integrity and strength.
A Farewell to a Trailblazer
The passing of Richard Parsons marks the end of an era for many. His commitment to excellence and transformative impact on corporate America will be remembered as a guiding light for present and future generations.
Frequently Asked Questions
What is Richard Parsons known for?
Richard Parsons was renowned for his leadership roles at major companies like Time Warner, CBS, and Citigroup, where he effectively managed crises and restored stability.
What challenges did Parsons face in his career?
He faced numerous challenges during his career, particularly during times of corporate distress, where he was called upon to implement strategic solutions.
How did his leadership impact the companies he worked for?
His leadership helped to stabilize and grow the companies, addressing stakeholder concerns and steering them through turbulent times.
What personal qualities made Parsons a successful leader?
Parsons was characterized by resilience, strategic decision-making, and a deep commitment to building trust with colleagues and stakeholders.
What will Richard Parsons' legacy be?
His legacy will be remembered in corporate leadership as a standard for effective management, resilience, and transformative leadership.

author: Caracol Radio"/>
title: Alcalde de Villa del Rosario apartó de su cargo al gerente del hospital
text:
Cúcuta
Hay revuelo en el hospital Jorge Cristo Sahium luego de conocerse la decisión que tomo el alcalde de Villa del Rosario de apartar de su cargo al actual gerente de este centro asistencial Dubán Martínez, quien venía ejerciendo desde el 2020 en el municipio histórico.
El mandatario señaló que jurídicamente, el actual gerente debía salir meses atrás por una decisión emanada por la Supersalud y la cual no se había cumplido. “El gerente fue retirado y ya no es gerente, se argumentó jurídicamente, porque él debía haber salido desde abril y la Superintendencia hizo silencio administrativo; y la norma y la ley nos permite que cuando se hace un silencio en las normas o sentencias se debe retirar por la junta directiva”.
Esta situación ha generado malestar entre los funcionarios y empleados del centro asistencial, que en las últimas horas han mantenido una protesta pacífica en la entrada del hospital, sin embargo, han señalado que continúan con la atención y los servicios que presta esta unidad médica.
Por ahora el alcalde de Villa del Rosario Carlos Julio Socha, ha señalado que aún no tiene nombre del nuevo gerente del hospital, pero sin embargo esta decisión la tomaría antes del viernes 29 de diciembre, y lo posesionaría buscando dejar un gerente en firme antes de su salida
“Yo voy a mirar quién queda encargado del hospital, debe ser algún miembro que está en carrera o de pronto un particular, creo que la norma me lo permite elegir el nuevo gerente, que creo que lo voy a posesionar el día viernes porque los tiempos me dan”.
En las últimas horas se dio vía libre a través de un decreto, donde se declaró abierta la convocatoria para que en un tiempo no máximo a dos días, se pueda nombrar un nuevo gerente en el hospital de Villa del Rosario haciendo el proceso de convocatoria y entrega de documentos del postulado con el fin de dejarlo posesionado antes de que termine su actual mandato.

author: Armando Pereda Maldonado
title: Juan Gabriel: el mexicano que rompió esquemas y que hoy hubiera cumplido 73 años
text:
Uno de los artistas mexicanos que siempre será inmortal, gracias al legado musical que dejó al mundo, es Juan Gabriel quien falleció el 28 de agosto del 2016, a los 66 años en Santa Mónica, Estados Unidos; debido a un infarto agudo miocardio y que este día hubiera llegado a los 73 años de edad . Alberto Aguilera Valadez, su nombre real, fue un cantautor que rompió esquemas pues no solo pudo ganarse el amor de su público; sino que siempre era tendencia por su forma de expresarse, su vestimenta y comportamiento.
Creció en una casa hogar debido a la precaria situación económica en la que vivía su familia. Juanga, como era llamado de cariño, fue el menor de 10 hermanos, pero ni ésta situación, ni otros retos que le presentó la vida fueron pretexto para no perseguir y cumplir sus sueños.
Lee también Diego Boneta revela que fue un gran amigo de Juan Gabriel: "Le decía tío"
El llamado " Divo de Juárez " dejó una fortuna valuada en 30 millones de dólares, entre propiedades y sus canciones, las cuales han recorrido el mundo entero traduciéndose a varios idiomas como japonés, alemán, italiano y francés, entre otros.
Además de tener una estrella en el Paseo de la Fama en Hollywood, el mexicano llegó a pisar escenarios como el Estadio Azteca, el Auditorio Nacional y fue de los pocos artistas en presentarse en el P alacio de Bellas Artes
Este recinto fue precisamente el lugar donde miles de sus fans acudieron a darle el último adiós; incluso, se registraron filas interminables y hubo quienes se quedaron toda la noche con tal de verlo una vez más.
El intérprete de temas como “Amor eterno”, “El Noa Noa”, “Por qué me haces llorar”, “Se me olvidó otra vez”, entre muchas más recibió una misa y flores en la estatua que tiene en Garibaldi, el día de su muerte, donde también se dieron cita imitadores.
Además del extenso repertorio que dejó, Juan Gabriel también apareció en algunas películas como “Nobleza ranchera”, de 1977; “Del otro lado del puente”, de 1978; “El Noa Noa”, de 1980; “Es mi vida”, de 1981; así como “¿Qué le dijiste a Dios”, su último filme .
De acuerdo con un certificado de defunción obtenido por el portal TMZ, Juan Gabriel tenía un historial de neumonía, al igual que una enfermedad cardiovascular ateroesclerótica, junto con diabetes e hipertensión.
Lee también Entre polémica por su herencia y el uso de inteligencia artificial, se estrena canción inédita de Juan Gabriel

author: Genell Reynolds
title: SLMPD confirmed 4 retailer break-ins
text: ST. LOUIS — The St. Louis Metropolitan Police Department has confirmed that a man is facing charges after they say he targeted four chain retailers in just one night. Dorian Harris, 26, has been charged with four counts of second-degree burglary, two counts of stealing, two counts of second-degree attempted burglary, and 2 counts of first-degree property damage. Harris stole a total of $1,500 from the stores, police said. On Tuesday night around 9 p.m., police responded to a burglary at Rainbow located in the 3600 block of Page Avenue. Other SLMPD officers also responded to a call around 9:15 p.m. at Randall's Wine and Spirits located in the 1900 block of South Jefferson Avenue. Police said this was an attempted burglary. Early Wednesday morning just after midnight, more officers responded to another burglary at Kids Footlocker located in the 3600 block of Page Avenue near the Rainbow store. Then around 1:30 a.m. on Wednesday, officers arrived at the scene of an attempted burglary at City Gear in the 3500 block of Bamberger Avenue. The initial investigation revealed surveillance footage that led police to Harris. Police said that Harris admitted his involvement in the burglaries. Missouri has requested pre-trial detention due to the nature of the offense and Harris' prior criminal history. In St. Clair County, Illinois, Harris has pleaded guilty to unlawful possession of a stolen vehicle and aggravated fleeing. Police did not say if Harris acted alone in these burglaries.

author: Tope Olaiya
title: Niger subsidises fertilizer, farm inputs by 50%
text:
Niger State Government has subsidised the prices of fertilizer by 50 per cent in order to achieve sustainable food security, reduce food cost as well as address unemployment in the state.
Governor Mohammed Umaru Bago announced this while launching the 2024 farming session’s sales and distribution of fertilizer and other agricultural inputs, at Farm Centre, Tunga in Minna.
Bago reiterated the commitment of his administration in prioritising agriculture, investing in machinery and technology to boost productivity in line with his New Niger Agenda.
He assured farmers of government support for the 2024 farming season and beyond.
Earlier, the Commissioner for Agriculture, Musa Salihu Bawa Bosso, said the state is prioritising implementation of the cultivation of 10,000 hectares of land in each of the 25 local government areas, adding that the ministry is working with the Niger Food to actualise the dream.
He added that the Niger State Agricultural and Mechanisation Development Authority (NAMDA) is working with Niger Food to address the need of 20,000 smallholder’s farmers and 10,000 medium holders, having access to 1,000 power tillers and agro inputs.
He appealed to the governor to support the resuscitation of the state’s buffer stock programme in comatose for several years so as to purchase in stock for sale at subsidised rates when necessary.

organizations.name: niger state agricultural and mechanisation development authority
